item.title: Sterlite Technologies share price soars over 9% as unit launches low-diameter optical fibre cable

For the first quarter of FY26, the company reported revenues of ₹1,019 crore and EBITDA of ₹140 crore, a growth of 17% YoY and
The Optical Networking Business reported 18.6% revenue growth and 55.7% EBITDA growth as compared to Q1 FY25.
